column4: my other issue is when i go to device manager all of my devices say unknown vendor and status is just "status". my biggest concern is that my laptop is hyperthreaded and its only registering one processor. does anyone know what might be causing all of this??
Have you got the smp kernel?
fujitsu and liable: imsorry im very new to linux, what is the smp kernel?
where would i get the smp kernel?
